alert.note: Alert for Orange County Inland; Riverside County Mountains; San Bernardino County Mountains; San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire; San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning; Santa Ana Mountains and Foothills (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 19 at 12:27PM PST until January 20 at 4:00PM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 4 PM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...North winds 15 to 30 mph with gusts over 50 mph at times over the mountain passes and canyons, and over 35 mph at times in the valleys. * WHERE...The Inland Empire, San Bernardino County Mountains, Riverside County Mountains, Santa Ana Mountains and Foothills, San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning, and Orange County Inland Areas. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 4 PM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strongest winds will be confined to areas near and below the major passes, and below wind-prone canyons along the coastal slopes and foothills.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Orange County Inland; Riverside County Mountains; San Bernardino County Mountains; San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire; San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning; Santa Ana Mountains and Foothills
